Description:
Entertainers Delight In Quiet Court Locale
If entertaining is high on your priority list then this lovely 3 bedroom home is sure to delight & a must to inspect. Well maintained & freshly painted throughout, the main bedroom offers a full ensuite & all 3 bedrooms have built in robes. The two living areas, both with split system reverse cycle air conditioners, are drenched in Northern sun & separated by the functional kitchen offering electric wall oven, gas cook top, pantry & dishwasher. For those who love outdoor living the huge pergola area will be a favourite gathering place & with the bonus of the lined games room/ man cave, entertaining all year round is covered. A storage/workshop area at the rear keeps everything safe & secure. Plenty of off-street parking, double gates to close off the good sized, low maintenance yard for the kids & pets complete this value packed property. Located within easy reach of the ring road, shopping centre, schools, transport & services this represents great buying for both owner occupiers & investors.
Insights: 10 Sten Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Exceptional opportunity!
Well located in the heart of Corio lies this neat as a pin two-bedroom home on an 598m2 (approx) allotment providing an excellent opportunity for those looking to get a foothold in the property market. The home comprises of a spacious lounge room that flows through to the dining area and the two generous bedrooms are serviced by the renovated bathroom. With a wide side driveway, carport, lock up garage and extensive rear garden with northerly aspect this property offers the possibility for future sub-division (STCA) presenting a fantastic opportunity for the astute purchaser with a keen eye for value. With all major amenities within easy reach such as the Corio Shopping Centre, medical facilities, schools for all ages and public transport, positioning could not be better!

Description:
Renovated, Extended and Unrivalled
A unique home on offer just move in all the hard works been done here. Offering a stunningly refreshing façade, with low maintenance front garden, open drive way and garage. On entrance be wowed by the living areas 3 zones on offer here, this home has received an extension to the original floor plan to create massive rooms everyone will love.
The kitchen in this home is massive and features corner window overlooking the rear yard, with oodles of bench and cupboard space with new oven. And stunning gloss black splash back feature tiling amongst gloss white cabinetry with SS Hardware.
Opening out to a spacious dining area with room for the largest of families here.
Open out is the lounge room and features a split system for year round comfort with carpeted floors and modern feature wall with privacy blinds and curtains. Step down to the rumpus room that doubles as a cinema room, toy room, or teenage retreat this home is jam packed with space.
All bedrooms are located to the front of the home and run off a central hall way, with master suite complete built in robes, and second and third bedroom all with built in robes. All rooms have internal window furnishings with the exterior home having outdoor blinds to the front of the home.
The home has a recently updated bathroom which features bath, separate shower with semi frameless screen, large vanity and toilet with privacy wall all in beautiful gloss white finish and feature wall
The rear yard has an open grassed area for the kids play equipment or dogs to run around in with under cover alfresco, store room, and enclosed garage. So a home loaded on extra features this one will sell quickly, defiantly a cut above the rest. All within walking distance to schools, public transport, Corio Village and just a short drive to the ring road. Currently returning: $300P/W until: July 2017 with great tenant.
Insights: 31 Caithness Crescent, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2016 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Solid Investment, Sound First Home
This lovely neat & tidy home with a versatile floorplan is within an easy walk to Corio Shopping Centre, transport, schools & services. There are 2 bedrooms & a study or 3rd bedroom, comfortable lounge room with gas heater & functional kitchen with gas cooking. The north facing back yard boasts an inviting in ground pool, & lush, inviting gardens. Securely fenced there is a large undercover area/ carport plus fully lined & powered single garage. With rental potential of approximately $280 per week this is a great first home or solid addition to your investment portfolio.

Description:
Exceptional Opportunity!
This vibrant and well maintained property provides an excellent investment opportunity for those looking to get a foot hold in the current property market. This tastefully designed 3 bedroom home will certainly capture your attention with its updates and light filled rooms. With the main living area at the front and the bedrooms all with built in robes at the rear, this home is sure to tick all the boxes. Comprising of a spacious main lounge off the front entry that flows into the dining area which provides access to the spotless kitchen with gas cooking. A gleaming central bathroom with separate toilet, 3 generous bedrooms and a practical laundry completes this exquisite property. Situated on an impressive 681m2 approx. allotment with ample parking space and a very generous rear yard containing single garage and long side driveway. Location is ideal, just a short stroll to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway this home really does have it all! A quality home of this standard packed full of value does not come to market often, do not miss your chance to secure this prime piece of real estate today!

Description:
Offering More than Meets the Eye
Comfort and space form a wonderful combination throughout this exceptionally updated three bedroom home. Ideally located in a quiet and established area with the convenience of shops, schools, public transport and the Ring Road; this family friendly home is sure to impress.
Proudly boasting three generous bedrooms with built-in robes. The formal living is is well portioned and accompanied by the light filled dining domain, that then seamlessly flows through to the wraparound kitchen with dishwasher, breakfast bar and ample cabinetry.
You can enjoy the modern comforts of the updated bathroom with a gorgeous freestanding bath tub.
Outside enjoy the fully fenced area from the carport through to the rear yard; forming the perfect combination as a private playground for your children and pets. You can also host family and friends with the undercover entertaining area. This modern home has everything you could want and more. Buy as a ready-made investment, family home, extend or sub divide (STCA).

Description:
Rare Development Opportunity
Although this property is typical in appearance it is extraordinary in the opportunity it presents and is sure to excite all builders and developers. The current owners have done all the hard work in obtaining a planning permit to add a 2nd dwelling in the rear and have started to renovate the front house. With 3 original bedrooms (one now converted to a dining room) and an updated kitchen plus some plumbing work that has already been performed to renovate the bathroom and laundry make this property a real developer's dream. Not only is the property located on a massive 710 m2 block in the residential growth zone but what makes this property really special is the existing planning permit to add a 2nd dwelling and the fact that the current owners have already added the services to allow for the next step in completing the subdivision meaning that you can start the development project immediately. Make your enquiry today and be ready to secure this fantastic project that's ready to roll.

Description:
Great Investment OR First Home
Positioned a short drive to schools, shops and the Geelong Ring Road, this property would make for a very affordable entry into the market and offers strong yields for investors.
Nestled in a community of 4, this 2 bedroom unit is in great condition & includes open plan tiled kitchen with gas cooking, open plan meals & living with floating timber floors, central bathroom, separate laundry, separate toilet & outdoor paved area to the North with a pull out awning for all weather entertaining. A reverse cycle air conditioning unit controls the climate year round. The property also includes a security system and a remote single car garage provides secure parking with direct access into the rear yard.
With a rental expectation of $250pw approx, this is the ideal investment opportunity to add to the portfolio with high yield and low maintenance. Call Dion for more details.

Description:
A Delighful Surprise, Modern Updates
Resting on a parcel of approx 657sqm with a north to rear aspect, this well maintained, comfortable home is ideally located in a quiet cul-de-sac. It provides easy access to the Ring Road & within walking distance to Corio Village shopping centre, reserves & primary & secondary schools.
•Single level layout showcases tastefully decorated interiors
•Two spacious living areas include separate lounge & dining
•Open plan living/kitchen embraces a light filled north aspect
•Newly renovated gas kitchen features 900mm upright stainless steel stove & dishwasher, breakfast bar & an abundance of cupboard/bench space
•Covered alfresco area extends onto low maintenance level lawns
•Well-proportioned bedrooms appointed with built-in-robes
•Two-way bathroom to the master has separate bath and shower, separate w/c
•Central heating plus evaporative cooling, feature gas log fire, new timber flooring, new fencing to all sides
•Double lock-up garage with additional off street parking
•Separate studio/workshop/gardeners retreat
•Large rear yard, lovely established cottage gardens, vegetable gardens & chook shed
•Located close to major arterial roads for rapid Melbourne/Surfcoast/Geelong CBD commute

Description:
Inviting family residence
On entry to this inviting family residence you can't help but feel at home. Simply perfect for those wanting to enter the market or investors looking for a tidy property to rent out straight away. Beautifully maintained this much loved family home provides a comfortable light filled living area with access through to the kitchen containing views to the backyard. 3 Generous bedrooms in total all serviced by the gleaming central bathroom. While outside a beautiful established garden provides a large aviary, double garage and undercover alfresco all situated on an impressive 612m2 approx. allotment. Location is ideal, just a short stroll to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway this home really does have it all!

Description:
Investment Opportunity
Investors take note; this picture perfect 2 bedroom unit is what you have been looking for. Bright & spacious, this home is the perfect addition for the portfolio, young enough to still give depreciation benefits. Leased until August 2017 to a quality tenant paying $260 per week, making it ideal for those wanting to step into the investment market or a great addition to your portfolio with a gross yield of approx 5.6%.
The kitchen, encompassing a pantry, ample bench and cupboard space, overlooks the open living/ dining area which is filled with natural light. The 2 generous bedrooms with built in robes and carpet will comfortably cater for tenants or owner occupiers. The modern central bathroom services the household along with separate laundry boasting a wall of built in cupboards for plenty of extra storage.
Stepping outside this comfortable unit has a paved area which leads to a spacious back yard which is big enough for kids & pets to play in and best of all has rear access to store the caravan or boat with complete security. Additional features include single garage, dishwasher and gas heating. Within easy reach of bus service, close to the shopping village and Ring Road, this one represents good value buying.

Description:
Close to Everything for Next to Nothing
Situated in the residential growth zone (RGZ2) this property represents excellent value for money and would suit a range of purchasers. Appealing to both first home buyers and those looking for an affordable investment property close to schools, shopping centres and public transport. The home comprises three bedrooms, two with built in robes, main bathroom and good-sized living area. Open-plan kitchen/dining leads to enclosed rear porch. Outside you will find a well-fenced north-facing rear yard perfect for a secure place for the kids to play. Completing the property is a single carport and lock up shed. Located minutes to Corio Village Shopping Centre, primary and high schools, medical centres and public transport, everything is at your fingertips. This is your chance to buy into the market at an affordable price but you will need to be quick.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Meticulously presented inside & out
If you're looking for a family home you can move straight in to, your search is now over. With plenty of space for the family, this renovated home full of character and charm is sure to suit first home buyers, families and investors alike. Built on a generous 592sqm block this property was designed with spacious living, privacy and entertaining in mind incorporating open plan living areas & an impressive sheltered outdoor entertaining area ideal for hosting year round dinner parties. Meticulously presented inside and out, the home comprises of 3 generously sized bedrooms with BIR's and ceiling fans all serviced by the large updated bathroom. A spacious living area at the front of the residence flows through to the central kitchen with meals area that provides large sliding doors leading out into a large fully landscaped backyard. Towards the rear of the property lies a spacious multi-purpose bungalow perfect for an additional bedroom or office space. Plenty of room for off street parking with a double carport and long driveway as well as additional oversized shed. With a great location, this property has all the major amenities at its fingertips! Just a minutes' stroll to the Corio Shopping Centre, bus routes located close by and around the corner from quality schools for all ages.
Insights: 17 Eumeralla Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2016 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Deceptively large and delightfully modern
Smart and sophisticated best describes this as new 3BR home plus study. Residence promises quality living at every turn. The entire family is treated to pure indulgence as soon as they step into this contemporary, luxury home.
Nestled in a convenient location for Melbourne commuters, this sleek home is close to the Princes Freeway with easy access to Geelong and Melbourne. It will certainly impress those looking for a low maintenance lifestyle and a fresh new home with a contemporary uncluttered, open layout design. Meticulously presented inside and out, the home also features a large master bedroom with WIR and Ensuite, second bathroom with separate toilet, study, three comfortable bedrooms (all with BIR) and a formal lounge/rumpus. Entertaining at this home is made simple with a kitchen that shines with style and practicality. Featuring a large island bench, double sink and stainless steel appliances, the kitchen adjoins the bright meals and living areas, forming the social hub of the home. Glass sliding doors open onto the undercover alfresco area, making indoor/outdoor entertaining seamless for added versatility and flexibility of living. The secure home with double garage is fitted with ducted heating as well as split system air conditioning for year round comfort. This house is ready for you to move in today.
Insights: 42 Corangamite Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Unique Investment/Development Opportunity
An outstanding opportunity presents with these 2 excellent concrete panel 3 bedroom properties. Both on separate titles, this duplex style arrangement is fantastic for the astute investor or purchaser looking for re-development opportunity (STCA). Each dwelling hosting long term tenants with combined rental return of $440 per week. Joint land component of over 1000m2 approx and walking distance to Public Transport, Corio Village and Schools. 15 minutes drive to Geelong CBD 50 minutes Melbourne. Each property has efficient gas cooking and heating along with low maintenance floorboards throughout. Both properties have a garden shed and clothesline. Auction will be conducted for both blocks together followed by second opportunity to purchase separately if not sold. View ASAP!

Description:
?A Place To Call Home?
Located in a quiet family friendly court in the ever popular pocket of Corio, this spacious home will definitely tick all the boxes.
Public transport is just minutes away, local reserves close by for the kids to play & walking distance to local shops as well as Corio Village Shopping Centre.
The ring road entrance just a stone's throw away, bringing Melbourne within an hour, Geelongs CBD 15 mins & the surfcoast about 30 mins.
-3 large bedrooms all with built in robes, master with A/C
-2 spacious living areas
-Updated throughout to boast a very modern & neutral feel
-Incredible kitchen with gas cooking & an abundance of storage space
-Fully renovated bathroom with huge double shower & separate toilet
-Ducted heating throughout
-Single carport with access to the backyard & further single garage
-Additional carport/undercover entertaining area to use however you wish
-Generous backyard space which is low maintenance with room for a boat or caravan
-Extra fenced yard, perfect for pets
This will make the perfect home for any family, inspect today!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
?Unbeatable Opportunity?
Situated in a quiet court location, public bus routes on Princess Road & Matthews Road, a short 5 min drive to Corio Village Shopping Centre & Northern Bay College Wexford campus.
-3 great sized bedrooms two with robes
-Large lounge with gas heating
-Spacious kitchen with gas cooking and lots of storage space
-Great tenants currently paying $275.00 per week until May 2017
-Great first home with potential to move in when tenants lease ends
-Meals area adjoins the kitchen and living and has A/C and ceiling fan
-Single lock up garage
-Spacious grassed backyard with undercover patio
Don?t miss out, inspect today!
